item.title: Example Lab Event
item.description: This is an example lab life entry. You can add more details here about the event, activity, or moment captured in the photo. To add more lab life entries: Copy this file and rename it (e.g., lablife/team-retreat-2025.md) Update the date, title, and summary Add your image to static/img/lablife/ Update image_preview and header.image to point to your image Write a description in the content area below the +++ markers Each entry will appear as a card in the Lab Life section with the image and short description.
